mapper.insert: INSERT INTO XBT_STU_EVALUATION_PROGRESSING( MODULE_ID, PROC_CD, PROC_YEAR, PROC_SEQ, USER_ID, BAG_SCAN_ID, ACTION_DIV, INSERT_DATE) SELECT MODULE_ID, #{procCd}, #{procYear}, #{procSeq}, #{userId}, BAG_SCAN_ID , ACTION_DIV , NOW() FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_DETAIL WHERE MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}
mapper.select: SELECT MODULE_ID, PROC_CD, PROC_YEAR, PROC_SEQ, USER_ID, BAG_SCAN_ID, ACTION_DIV, INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_STU_EVALUATION_PROGRESSING WHERE PROC_CD = #{procCd} AND PROC_YEAR = #{procYear} AND PROC_SEQ = #{procSeq} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND END_YN = 'N'
